ch0130_90_serena/0101_0701_02_10:
I’m doing great! I’m gonna forge ahead to be
a champion!
ch0130_90_serena/7101_0701_01_10:
Look! This gorgeous dress was specially made
for me.
ch0130_90_serena/7101_0701_02_10:
Its elegant design combines both beauty and class,
don’t you agree?
ch0130_90_serena/7101_0701_03_10:
I need to keep battling so this outfit doesn’t
outshine me!
ch0130_90_serena/7102_0701_01_10: I traveled around Kalos with Greninja.
ch0130_90_serena/7102_0701_02_10:
He helped me many times, using Water-type
moves that utilized his quick movements.
ch0130_90_serena/7102_0701_03_10: He’s an important friend who I can depend on.
ch0130_90_serena/7103_0701_01_10:
My neighbor Calem is my rival and a good friend.
He also comes shopping with me a lot.
ch0130_90_serena/7103_0701_02_10:
Do you want to go shopping with us? I’m keen
to know what your sense of fashion is like,
so please come!
ch0130_90_serena/7104_0701_01_10:
There are many girls that love to wear dresses,
and I’m one of them.
ch0130_90_serena/7104_0701_02_10: But I’m not satisfied with simply being cute.
ch0130_90_serena/7104_0701_03_10:
I want to be super cute AND a champion
of Pokémon battles.
ch0130_90_serena/7104_0701_04_10: Don’t you think girls like that are amazing?
ch0130_90_serena/7105_0701_01_10: I want to be number one in everything I do.
ch0130_90_serena/7105_0701_02_10:
Don’t forget, though... Everyone out there is
number one in someone’s eyes.
ch0130_90_serena/7105_0701_03_10:
I’m sure there’s someone who thinks of you as
their number one, too, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0130_90_serena/7105_0701_04_10: Make sure to keep that in mind.
ch0130_90_serena/1701_0702_01_10:
In order to become a champion, you need to know
how to use items well!
ch0130_90_serena/2501_0701_01_10:
It’s true—we’re gonna continue to forge ahead,
aiming to be champions...
ch0130_90_serena/2501_0701_02_10: You came all this way by yourself.
ch0130_90_serena/2501_0701_03_10:
You should give yourself more praise for that,
don’t you think?
ch0130_90_serena/2501_0702_01_10: I know it’s hard to give yourself praise.
ch0130_90_serena/2501_0702_02_10: So I’ll give you a lot instead.
ch0130_90_serena/2501_0702_03_10: You are amazing! I depend on you all the time!
ch0130_90_serena/2511_0701_01_10:
When I become a champion, there’s something I
want to do.
ch0130_90_serena/2511_0701_02_10: What do you think it is?
ch0130_90_serena/2511_0701_03_10:
The correct answer is...I wanna guide a challenger
to the Hall of Fame!
ch0130_90_serena/2511_0701_04_10:
I wanna be someone who can praise someone
else’s hard work and accomplishments... Don’t 
you think that would be amazing?
ch0130_90_serena/2511_0702_03_10:
Since it comes with a lot of responsibility, I bet I’ll
be really nervous when I actually do it.
ch0130_90_serena/3001_0701_01_10:
Waking up early is important for beauty...
But the things I like are worth the effort.
ch0130_90_serena/3003_0701_01_10:
As a champion, I think it’s important to be proud
of yourself and know who you are!
ch0130_90_serena/3005_0701_01_10:
I like the night. It gives me the chance to rest my
body after a battle or training.
